GIPMER Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 22 Senior Resident Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 16, 2025, 16:31 IST
 Govind Ballabh Pant Institute for Postgraduate Medical Education and Research
 22 Jobs |  Posted On : 16-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 67,700 to 67,700




FOLLOW

Govind Ballabh Pant Institute of Postgraduate Medical Education and Research (GIPMER) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 22 Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, Post-Graduation, and Diploma can grab this chance and apply for the GIPMER Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the interview at the address given below. Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Delhi.

GIPMER Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Senior Resident 	22	MBBS, Post Graduation, Diploma

Age Limit for the GIPMER Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 45 years.

Selection Process for the GIPMER Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the GIPMER Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 67,700 /- per month.

Application fee for the GIPMER Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the GIPMER Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the Recruitment or career page.
Check for the Senior Resident Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Then, attend the interview along with the relevant documents at the address given below.

Venue

Anaesthesiology & Intensive Care Department, 6th floor, Academic Block GIPMER

Important Dates

Date of alkin-Interview	22-08-2025
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
